snippet.title: Wii Fitness - Gold's Gym Cardio Workout Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Gold´s Gym Cardio Workout is a great Wii Fitness game which combines fun Nintendo Wii gaming with the workout knowledge of Gold´s Gym International trainers. While the title is a bit misleading -- as most of the core exercises consist on cardio boxing -- you will be sweating and feeling the burning after doing the first basic lessons.

For more information on this game visit http://www.wiifitnessactive.com/wii-fitness-games/golds-gym-cardio-workout/
